    <PropertyValue>// **************************************************
// Custom code for MainController
// Created: 4/28/2021 12:23:44 PM
// **************************************************
//
//	REVISION LOG
//
//	eb1 04/28/21	eric blackwelder @ CDI
//		customization on dashboard to add button that will flag all records in specific tab
//
// **************************************************

using System;
using System.ComponentModel;
using System.Data;
using System.Diagnostics;
using System.Windows.Forms;
using Ice.BO;
using Ice.UI;
using Ice.Lib;
using Ice.Adapters;
using Ice.Lib.Customization;
using Ice.Lib.ExtendedProps;
using Ice.Lib.Framework;
using Ice.Lib.Searches;
using Ice.UI.FormFunctions;

public class Script
{
	// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do Not Remove 'Begin/End Wizard Added Module Level Variables' Comments! **
	// Begin Wizard Added Module Level Variables **

	// End Wizard Added Module Level Variables **

	// Add Custom Module Level Variables Here **

	private EpiDataView edvV_JobClose_1View2;


	public void InitializeCustomCode()
	{
		// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Variable Initialization' lines **
		// Begin Wizard Added Variable Initialization

		// End Wizard Added Variable Initialization

		// Begin Wizard Added Custom Method Calls

		// End Wizard Added Custom Method Calls

		this.edvV_JobClose_1View2 = ((EpiDataView)(this.oTrans.EpiDataViews["V_JobClose_1View2"]));

		btnFlagAll.Click += btnFlagAll_Click;

	}

	public void DestroyCustomCode()
	{
		// ** Wizard Insert Location - Do not delete 'Begin/End Wizard Added Object Disposal' lines **
		// Begin Wizard Added Object Disposal

		// End Wizard Added Object Disposal

		// Begin Custom Code Disposal

		// End Custom Code Disposal

		this.edvV_JobClose_1View2 = null;

		btnFlagAll.Click -= btnFlagAll_Click;

	}

	public void btnFlagAll_Click(object sender, System.EventArgs args)
	{


		if (edvV_JobClose_1View2.dataView.Count == 0)
		{
			return;
		}

		foreach (DataRowView drv in edvV_JobClose_1View2.dataView)
		{
			//for testing only:
			//if((string)drv["JobHead_JobNum"] == "000004")
			//{

			drv["JobHead_JobClosed"] = true;

			//}

			//used to make sure all updated rows show a change on the form
			Control c1 = csm.GetNativeControlReference("80a69b80-3aa2-4534-9510-0ebcbd34c1ba");
			EpiUltraGrid eugStockReceiptsX = (EpiUltraGrid)c1;
			CurrencyManager currencyManagerCustomers = 	  
				(CurrencyManager)eugStockReceiptsX.BindingContext[eugStockReceiptsX.DataSource];
			eugStockReceiptsX.ActiveRow = eugStockReceiptsX.Rows[0];
			eugStockReceiptsX.Rows[0].Selected = true;

		}

	}

}
